```{r}
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
library(ggplot2)

data <- read.csv("Australian Bureau of Statistics-2.csv")
```

```{r}
nm  <- names(data)
idx <- grepl("^Between[._ ]\\d{4}[._ ]and[._ ]\\d{4}$", nm)  
nm[idx] <- sub("^Between[._ ](\\d{4}).*$", "\\1", nm[idx])
names(data) <- nm

```

```{r}
data <- data %>% 
  slice(1:10) 
```

```{r}
year_cols <- c("2016", "2017", "2018", "2019", "2020")

df_long <- data %>%
  select(State = X, all_of(year_cols)) %>%
  pivot_longer(
    cols = -State,
    names_to = "Year",
    values_to = "Number"
  ) %>%
  mutate(
    Number = as.numeric(gsub(",", "", Number)),
    Year = as.integer(Year)
  )

ggplot(df_long, aes(x = Year, y = Number, color = State, group = State)) +
  geom_line() +
  geom_point() +
  theme_minimal()

```
